performances.description: C'mon, this is SURELY the definitive version?! Pigpen is so strong yet so poignantly vulnerable in this cut, with perfect fills from Jerry and Bill.
I think all the Europe72 versions are stellar but this is my favorite but 5-10 is a better source
'cause I hated seeing a 0 here....From the Netherlends, a great show
They played this song great all tour.  Rotterdam is the definitive, but this one is quite good and Pig's last.
To me, this one is just exactly perfect. Pigpen's swan song. Definitely my favorite arrow in his quiver.
Another gem at this amazing show!

performances.venue: Academy of Music New York, NY
performances.description: Another beautiful version from 1972.  This song always seems like Pig's swan song.  One of the best versions.

performances.venue: Academy of Music New York, NY
performances.description: Beautiful version as they get it ready for E72.

performances.venue: Academy of Music New York, NY
performances.description: A true pigpen classic delivered with passion like only Ron could bring, Beautiful and floating a truly lovely moment.

performances.venue: Academy of Music New York, NY
performances.description: Pigpen sells this one to me.
Pig seems more melancholy than usual here, a very slow and touching rendition.

performances.venue: Academy of Music New York City, NY
performances.description: Debut of this powerful Pigpen love song, brilliant
Powerful Pigpen song full of emotional power. Beautiful an amazing love song with loads of Pigpen.
